channel.title: Anatomy of a Joke on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Anatomy of a Joke on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Anatomy of a Joke: Bill Burr on the Mushroom Trip That Inspired His ‘Sad Men’ Bit in ‘Drop Dead Years’
item.description: Bill Burr sat down with Variety for the inaugural episode of “Anatomy of a Joke,” a new video series spotlighting stand-up comedians and the process behind one of their favorite punchlines
